import axios from 'axios' import React, { Component } from 'react' export class Edit extends Component { state={ client: '' } handleClick = () => { this.setState({ client: true }) axios.updat(`annonces`, this.state).then(response => { console.log(response) }) } handleAfterClick = () => { this.setState({ client: false }) } render() { console.log(this.props.annonce.id) var annonce = this.props.annonce let post; if(this.state.client === true){ post = ( ) }else{ post = ( ) } return (
{post}
) } } export default Edit;
